Scribe Scroll.benefit: You can create a scroll of any spell that you know. See magic item creation rules for more information.

Brew Potion.benefit: When running, you move five times your normal speed (if wearing medium, light, or no armor and carrying no more than a medium load) or four times your speed (if wearing heavy armor or carrying a heavy load). If you make a jump after a running start (see Acrobatics), you gain a +4 bonus on your Acrobatics check. While running, you retain your Dexterity bonus to your Armor Class.

Run.benefit: When running, you move five times your normal speed (if wearing medium, light, or no armor and carrying no more than a medium load) or four times your speed (if wearing heavy armor or carrying a heavy load). If you make a jump after a running start (see Acrobatics), you gain a +4 bonus on your Acrobatics check. While running, you retain your Dexterity bonus to your Armor Class.

Toughness.benefit: You gain +3 hit points, and an additional hit point for every Hit Die beyond 3.

Improved Initiative.description: Your quick reflexes allow you to react to react rapidly to danger.
Improved Initiative.benefit: You get a +4 bonus on initiative checks.

Dodge.description: Your training and reflexes allow you to react swiftly to avoid an opponent's attacks.
Dodge.benefit: You gain a +1 dodge bonus to your AC. A condition that makes you lose your Dex bonus to AC also makes you lose the benefits of this feat.

Quick Draw.description: You can draw weapons faster than most.
Quick Draw.benefit: You can draw a weapon as a free action instead of as a move action. You can draw a hidden weapon as a move action instead of a standard action.

Power Attack.description: You can make exceptionally deadly melee attacks by sacrificing accuracy for strength.
Power Attack.benefit: You can choose to take a –1 penalty on all melee attack rolls and combat maneuver checks to gain a +2 bonus on all melee damage rolls.

Cleave.description: You can strike two adjacent foes with a single swing.
Cleave.benefit: As a standard action, you can make a single attack at your full base attack bonus against a foe within reach. If you hit, you deal damage normally and can make an additional attack (using your full base attack bonus) against a foe that is adjacent to the first and also within reach. You can only make one additional attack per round with this feat. When you use this feat, you take a –2 penalty to your Armor Class until your next turn.

Two-Weapon Fighting.description: You can fight with a weapon wielded in each of your hands. You can make one extra attack each round with the secondary weapon.
Two-Weapon Fighting.benefit: Your penalties on attack rolls for fighting with two weapons are reduced. The penalty for your primary hand lessens by 2 and the one for your off hand lessens by 6.

Point-Blank Shot.description: You are especially accurate when making ranged attacks against close targets.
Point-Blank Shot.benefit: You get a +1 bonus on attack and damage rolls with ranged weapons (and ranged touch spells) at ranges of up to 30 feet.

Precise Shot.description: You are adept at firing ranged attacks into melee.
Precise Shot.benefit: You don't take the -4 for firing into melee

Far Shot.description: You are more accurate at longer ranges.
Far Shot.benefit: You only suffer a –1 penalty per full range increment between you and your target when using a ranged weapon.
